Description:
A new era of crazy shootings and looting gambling ! Play as one of four new treasure hunters fighting with different creatures, psychos and one evil genius , Handsome Jack .
Choose a hero and how his next shell - by tradition at your disposal a huge arsenal of weapons , ammunition and equipment - and more and more. Items on Pandora are generated automatically and you can never know in advance what kind of gun will be in the near box ! Discover new secrets Pandora Suck character as the assignments , make friends and make enemies - become the hero of their own history in the world full of surprises Borderlands!
